allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "feat: Add agent orchestration system with specialized agents" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Implements comprehensive agent orchestration system for Claude Code
- Adds three specialized agents: workflow-admin, code-reviewer, and debugger
- Provides complete documentation for agent creation and usage best practices
- Updates CLAUDE.md with storage abstraction layer details
- Removes obsolete SSH setup scripts from Replit migration

## Changes
- **New Agents:**
  - `workflow-admin`: Manages development workflow, context preparation, and GitHub staging
  - `code-reviewer`: Automated code quality checks with Black, Flake8, and Vulture integration
  - `debugger`: Systematic bug analysis through evidence gathering

- **Documentation:**
  - Agent creation guidelines with detailed specifications
  - Agent usage guide with best practices and decision patterns
  - Updated CLAUDE.md with environment-aware database configuration

- **Cleanup:**
  - Removed obsolete `setup_ssh.sh` and `tools/setup_ssh.sh` scripts

## Test Plan
- [ ] Verify workflow-admin agent properly prepares development context
- [ ] Test code-reviewer agent runs automated quality tools correctly
- [ ] Confirm debugger agent systematically analyzes issues
- [ ] Validate documentation completeness and accuracy
- [ ] Ensure no regressions in existing functionality

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)")
